title: Red Thai chicken and broccoli curry
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '2 chicken breast halves, cut in strips', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1 1/2 teaspoons red thai curry paste', '250ml coconut milk', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 head broccoli, divided in florets', '3 spring onions, chopped']
